title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Steamboat Springs, Colorado
content:
Photo submitted by Brian Turany, “I took my Bingham Built bike to Steamboat Springs, Colorado, for SBT GRVL and stayed in town for a couple extra days. I dropped a message to Brad Bingham, the builder of my bike, to ask if I could see his factory/workshop. After a brief tour, he invited my wife and I out for a ride. Brad and his wife are amazing people, maybe just as amazing as their bikes! They took us out to Stagecoach Reservoir and onto some ‘secret’ dirt roads. I won this bike in the CXC fundraiser raffle which benefits the manufacture of adaptive sit-skis. More great prizes are available this year.”

Bike: Bingham Built with S & S couplers
Fork: ENVE All Road
Wheels: HED Emporia
Group: SRAM Red/Force AXS
Cockpit: Bontrager XXX bar and post, Elite stem, and Aeolus special edition saddle.

We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

*Please note that public spaces and parks may have restrictions or be closed to the public due to COVID-19, please check before heading out.
author: Kristi Benedict
